name: Avoidon
description:
Avoidon is easy to control casual endless runner game.
Avoid obstacles by changing direction up and down with just one touch.

Fly as far as you can!

Every level has three stages followed by next round with higher speed!

Pick up power-ups to help you survive.
Beware of treacherous power-downs!

Collect coins to unlock worlds and aircrafts.

Compare your scores with your friends on Leaderboards and unlock Achievements!

Features:
- 6 Levels with 3 stages.
- 6 Worlds (Level backgrounds). Mountain, Space, Spooky, Islands, Walls, Woods.
- 6 Aircrafts.
- Beautiful soundtrack.
- Colorful HD graphics.
